timeline.bodyText: why do we need to introduce this additional case that the client needs to check for? Can't we simply do the same as for a 2xx != 200 status code, i.e. completing the future with a mapped message containing the original device payload and target address? That way the client wouldn't need to handle a null result specifically, would it?
